title: CAA successfully sharing case access with another solicitor in their org
specs: S1 - a solicitor, to create a case under their organisation and share it with a fellow solicitor in the same organisation
CAA - a PUI case access admin, to share it with a solicitor in the same organisation
S2 - a solicitor in the same organisation, with whom CW1 will share a care with an assignment within their organisation
is to be invoked by CAA to assign access over C1 for S2 within the same organisation

body.status_message: Roles [Defendant],[Claimant] from the organisation policies successfully assigned to the assignee.
